mapper.select: Select a.id as area_id, a.name as area_name, sa.id as subject_area_id, sa.area_id as subject_area_area_id, sa.subject_id as subject_area_subject_id, s.id as subject_id, s.name as subject_name, s.room_type_needed as subject_room_type from areas a inner join subject_area sa on a.id = sa.area_id inner join subjects s on s.id = sa.subject_id
